```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```R
sounds <- hashtab()
sounds[["cat"]] <- "meow"
sounds[["dog"]] <- "woof"

sounds[["horse"]] <- "neigh"
sounds[["cow"]] <- "moo"

maphash(sounds, function(key, value) {
    print(paste(key, "-", value))
})
```

```
Rscript dict.R

[1] "cat - meow"
[1] "cow - moo"
[1] "horse - neigh"
[1] "dog - woof"
```
